title: playerpoints插件的计分板变量
author: 江东小飞机
txt_content: 计分板使用的是liteborad。求插件playerpoints点券插件的变量

replies.author: mcvimik
replies.txt_content:
点券变量名是   %playerpoints_points%

然后   变量插件给你，你安装到\PlaceholderAPI\expansions   该目录下

输入 papi reload
就好了









Expansion-PlayerPoints.jar


2020-2-12 11:10 上传
点击文件名下载附件




2.11 KB, 下载次数: 30
你用papi下载变量就行了/papi ecloud download playerpoints 然后 /papi reload

replies.author: 江东小飞机
replies.txt_content:
1315588141 发表于 2020-2-12 10:15
你用papi下载变量就行了/papi ecloud download playerpoints 然后 /papi reload
no cloud expansions are available at this time

replies.author: 江东小飞机
replies.txt_content:
1315588141 发表于 2020-2-12 10:17
变量是points
这个也试过了

replies.author: 绝望的枫岚
replies.txt_content:
输入/papi ecloud download PlayerPoints安装点券变量 /papi ecloud download vault安装vault变量 /papi reload重载就行
点券变量%playerpoints_points%
其他变量这里查https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/placeholderapi-placeholders/
帮到你的话  麻烦给个最佳 Thanks

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content:
https://api.extendedclip.com/expansions/playerpoints/
点击此处可找到下载链接
将jar文件放入PlaceholderApi文件夹中expansions文件夹下
再重载插件即可
此拓展只有一个变量，即%playerpoints_points%显示玩家点券数量
